DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test whether diet contain potato differ glycemic index/load useful weight loss , blood sugar control maintain current body weight .
DOC.brief_title: STUDY : Effects Potatoes Weight Loss Program
DOC.detailed_description: The study examine effect include potato part calorie restrict diet design induce weight loss improve glycemic control overweight subject . This randomized , treatment-controlled , 3-arm , parallel study . The 3 arm study include dietary manipulation free-living set include potatoes/potato product frequently diet ( 5-7 day / week ) . Two diet energy-restricted ( ~ 500 kcal deficit /d ) weight loss control diet prescribed weight maintenance . The two energy-restricted diet include manipulation , , one dietary plan high glycemic index ( GI ) diet low glycemic index diet .

Total cholesterol ( TC ) great 300 mg/dL , Fasting triglyceride great 300 mg/dL , LDL cholesterol ( LDLC ) great 180 mg/dL , Smokers Female subject pregnant lactate Subjects take medication would interfere outcome study Subjects unusual dietary habit ( eg. , pica ) Subjects actively losing weight try lose weight Subjects addict drug alcohol < 1 recovery program Subjects present significant psychiatric neurological disturbance Subjects know allergy intolerance potato product Subjects document atherosclerotic disease , inflammatory disease , diabetes mellitus , uncontrolled hypertension ( 140/90 mm Hg ) , chronic lung , renal liver disease
